product_overview: A high-performance, glassmorphism-themed personal portfolio built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS to showcase projects and provide a contact channel. The site emphasizes responsive design, neon accents, and smooth interactive elements.
core_goals: Provide an easily navigable portfolio to showcase projects and skills.
Offer an interactive, responsive projects gallery with hover interactions and visual polish.
Expose a simple contact form for visitors to send inquiries reliably with client-side validation.
Deliver fast performance and accessible UX across devices using Next.js and optimized assets.

features.name: Navigation
features.description: Main site navigation allowing users to move between Home, About, Projects and Contact pages via the header navigation.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Click on Projects link -> See /projects page content
Navigate to / -> Click on About link -> See /about page content
Navigate to / -> Click on Contact link -> See /contact page content
Navigate to / -> Click on Home link -> See / page content
Navigate to / -> Click on Projects link -> Network failure occurs while loading -> See error message or fallback UI indicating the page failed to load

features.name: Projects Display
features.description: Showcase and browse portfolio projects on the /projects page with scrollable layout and hover interactions on project cards.
user_flows: Navigate to /projects -> Scroll through projects -> Hover on project cards -> See hover overlay with project details
Navigate to /projects -> Hover on project cards -> Click on a project card (if applicable) -> See project detail modal or expanded view
Navigate to /projects -> Scroll through projects -> See images failing to load -> See placeholder image or alt text displayed
Navigate to /projects -> Scroll through projects quickly -> Observe smooth scroll and animations active

features.name: Contact Form
features.description: A contact form at /contact where visitors can submit name, email and message. Includes client-side validation and submission feedback.
user_flows: Navigate to /contact -> Fill name field -> Fill email field -> Fill message field -> Click Send button -> See success confirmation message
Navigate to /contact -> Fill name field -> Fill email field with invalid email -> Fill message field -> Click Send button -> See validation error for email field
Navigate to /contact -> Leave name or message field empty -> Click Send button -> See required-field validation errors
Navigate to /contact -> Fill name field -> Fill email field -> Fill message field -> Click Send button -> Network failure occurs on submit -> See submission error message and option to retry
